title: Wearable technology market share in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014 , by product
summary: This is a bar chart representing Wearable technology products in the x axis and Share of market in the y axis.
The Share of market is appeared to be the highest at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and lowest at Wearable technology products Smart watches.
The maximum Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has got 3.55 times higher Share of market than the minimum Wearable technology products Smart watches.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has the highest Share of market and Smart watches has the lowest Share of market.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Wearable technology products in the x axis and Share of market in the y axis.
The Share of market is appeared to be the highest at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers and lowest at Wearable technology products Smart watches.
The maximum Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has got 3.55 times higher Share of market than the minimum Wearable technology products Smart watches.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Wearable technology products, and Share of market in each Wearable technology products on the y axis.
Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has the highest Share of market and Smart watches has the lowest Share of market.
The second highest Share of market is appeared to be the Wearable technology products Wrist sport computers.
The highest Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has 28.0 more Share of market than the lowest Wearable technology products Smart watches.
Share of market at Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers is 39.0 , second place is Wrist sport computers at 26.0, and thirdly is Action cameras headsets and glasses at 24.0.
The Wearable technology products Health and fitness trackers has 1.56 times more Share of market than average.
Summing up the values of all Wearable technology productss, we get total 100.0.
